long_description: This handy, gel-based Nikwax Footwear Cleaning Gel works on all suede, nubuck or smooth-finish leathers. Removes stubborn dirt and helps revive breathability, leaving your boots ready for a fresh application of Nikwax treatment. Recommended for Gore-Tex(R) or SympaTex(R) products. Formulated to retain leather's water repellency, unlike other cleaners that strip leather of its natural oils. Please note: color may run; test on a discreet area first.
short_description: This handy, gel-based Nikwax Footwear Cleaning Gel works on all suede, nubuck or smooth-finish leathers.
